We don't need to speak about who was at fault - Verstappen

Red Bull driver Max Verstappen, speaking about his collision with team-mate Daniel Ricciardo: "Disappointing for the team. We lost a lot of points unneccessarily. We don't need to speak about who is at fault because we are representing a team.

"The tow was very strong. We were pretty similar speed and always very close. Before that it was hard racing but very fair. What happened afterwards was not good. This has happened before, you learn from it and we have to make sure it doesn't happen again. We will talk about it and see what happens."

Are you and Daniel OK afterwards? "Yes, of course. As racing drivers you go for every inch. We are very fair to each other and spoke immediately afterwards."

replies.msg:
呢條例就係話唔俾煞車嘅時候「無故咁轉變方向」
用返原句就係 "any change of direction under braking which results in another driver having to take evasive action will be considered abnormal and hence potentially dangerous to other drivers."

但係因為F1轉咗手俾班美國佬，佢哋就覺得呢啲規則定得太死，要放寬返，所以就用一句籠統咁包含晒，總之有「唔尋常嘅行為」先會查，原句係 "if a driver moves erratically or goes unnecessarily slowly or behaves in a manner that could endanger another driver, then he will be investigated."

我睇落去就只係Max一路防守緊，Ric第一下向右一個假動作呃咗Max Cover佢，當時佢哋未煞車

跟住佢哋兩個真係開始煞車，Ric扭返去左邊想攝Max左邊嘅空位，但係Max已經估到Ric會用呢招，扭完右即刻向左慢慢漂返去賽道左邊嘅同時煞車，Ric反應唔切Lock up咗隊埋去Max到。最重要係佢哋煞車嘅時候都係喺Braking zone裏面，Max只係防守緊佢嘅位，好難話佢有心危害Ric

They are both in the doghouse'
Red Bull team boss Christian Horner on the collision between team-mates Max Verstappen and Daniel Ricciardo: "They both recognise that they screwed up today and will be apologising to the team and to all members of the team. We allow them to race and allow them to go wheel-to-wheel. We spoke to them in team meetings about giving each other space, this was culmination of two guys talking things into their own hands, which shouldn't have happened.

"There were probably three incidents between them through the race. They touched wheels and were told to calm it down, we don't want to interfere with them going wheel-to-wheel. We are not apportioning blame one way or the other, they are both to blame for this.

"Our intention is to continue to let them race but they have to show respect and give space. They have been reminded that they are part of a team, they are highly paid indivudals with the team's interest at heart. The message was delivered very clearly.

"They are both in the doghouse. They will apologise to all of the staff before Barcelona.

今年兩個四屆可以有部差唔多戰鬥力嘅車揸（暫時拉利快少少）真係超好睇。
兩個四屆各有長短
VET 嘅優點係：只要排到頭位，基本上你好難過到佢，帶頭控制節奏，同埋極少自己帶頭犯錯。唔好以為Pole to win 好簡單，例如你擺哥桑落去架火星車到，我唔相信佢做到VET 果種穩。
VET 嘅缺點係埋身肉搏時經常犯低級錯誤（例如2017新加坡站，起步無必要咁閘法）

HAM 嘅優點係防守同過車都好多手段，Wheel to Wheel (唔係19Max 果種），現役車手應該得Kimi,ALO 同RIC 係同一個level, 呢種特質可能係佢細個玩Kart 仔果時揸雞車逼出嚟，車唔夠人快，就要用多d 手段，你可以話佢賤，話佢狗，但佢無犯規，你吹佢唔漲。
缺點係太唔穩定，即使星期六排位做到君臨天下咁快，星期日一起步可以無曬速度，帶帶下頭都可以自己上草地，睇到個心都離一離

內容大致係話因為西班牙，英國同法國三條賽道鋪咗新瀝青，多咗grip同埋tyre wear細咗

問題係：tyre wear細咗導致多咗rubber喺胎面發熱，就出現overheating（我估驚會爆胎？呢點求各位ching解釋下）

咁pirelli就向fia提出呢三場嘅胎面厚度減少4mm，希望減低overheating嘅問題，而唔會搞到本身定好嘅tyre choice

pirelli就話除咗每條胎輕咗1kg之外係本身冇分別嘅（即係配方不變，係減料only）

咁fia就接受咗，所以就出現只限三場特供版本嘅胎

（上面講緊嘅大陸討論應該係呢段？https://m.hupu.com/bbs/21932150.html

胎溫過熱少咗，benz或成最大贏家）

問題係：tyre wear細咗導致rubber喺胎面留得耐咗，就出現overheating（我估驚會爆胎？呢點求各位ching解釋下）
